column5: Any ofners with kids are more than welcome to join.After the bday party Im taken both of mine and 2 others for some fishing.If you have young kids and are in the hammer,come on down!Itll be a blast!Perch were on fire this am!xraps,shhhh!!!!!!!!! Just look for the guy that isnt fishing!LOL Well we got there just before sundown,kids were happy and they saw a lot of bluegills nibbling to keep them occupied for a bit. I would like to thank one gent,dont know who he was!But he helped rig up the lines and lent me 4 bobbers for the kids to use .I forgot my box at home.In return I gave him a spinner harness for all his help! Thank you,kindly who ever you are! list of pics 1. A dead salmon under the dock 2. Rainbow in the sky,kids wanted a pic 3. Upset swan 4. the kids, and the bday girl was taking pics 5. same as #4 the one in front posing is my youngist 6. peed off swan trying to eat my rod tip(does shimano warranty this?) 7. all the kids fishing,#3 girl is the BDAY GIRL

Vince, you're a brave man. I spent some time fishing with a 5 year old last week, which I haven't done in a decade when my daughter was that age... And that was just 1!  Can't wait to see the pics.  I love watching little kids fishing. Their excitement is just infectious, but they do take their toll.  Cheers!
OMG is that salmon still there? i want it
wrong word snaggers with the dead salmons
Looks like the kids had a good time Vinni.... good on you
You seen it too,Eh!I think someone past it off to another,then it slipped out of their hands.Cause he didnt get there on his own.WAY TOO EARLY!Esp there!
Thanks leechman,their a well behaved bunch!
My bad    Wish your daughter a belated happy birthday and a big hug for me
Well sort of,notice the floating dock and the upset swans! Something had to keep them at bay
